definitions.definition: An optical instrument for measuring the absorption of light by chemical substances ; typically it will plot a graph of absorption versus wavelength or frequency , and the patterns produced are used to identify the substances present, and their internal structure .

main_definition: ( analytical chemistry ) An optical instrument for measuring the absorption of light by chemical substances ; typically it will plot a graph of absorption versus wavelength or frequency , and the patterns produced are used to identify the substances present, and their internal structure .
